wildan.name: Wildan J. Belfiore
wildan.title: President Director
wildan.bio: Wildan is a visionary technologist with a rich background in full-stack engineering. Since 2022, he has honed his skills across diverse industries, contributing to complex projects at renowned organizations such as Xapiens, Biro Klasifikasi Indonesia, Lumoshive, and the British Technologies Global Group. His passion for innovation and leadership led him to co-found Micro Padma Nusantara in 2023, where he serves as President Director. Concurrently, he holds the position of Chief Technology Officer at Huntr.id, driving the technological vision for both companies and pioneering solutions that shape the future.

raihan.name: Raihan Firdaus
raihan.title: Business Solutions Manager
raihan.bio: Raihan brings a unique blend of public sector experience and strategic business acumen to the team. His journey began in 2022 with a foundational role at BPS (Badan Pusat Statistik), which provided him with deep analytical insights. He then transitioned to a staff position at KCIC (Kereta Cepat Indonesia China), where he continues to contribute to one of the nation's key infrastructure projects. Since 2023, Raihan has simultaneously taken on the role of Business Solutions Manager at Micro Padma Nusantara, where he excels at bridging client needs with powerful, effective technology solutions.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains what data we collect and how we use it.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
commitment.content: PT Micro Padma Nusantara ('we,' 'our,' or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information when you use our website and services (collectively, the 'Services'). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

infoCollected.title: 1. Information We Collect
infoCollected.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, information we collect automatically, and information from third-party sources.
infoCollected.item1: Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, phone number, company name, industry, and any other information you provide when you fill out a contact form, subscribe to our newsletter, or otherwise communicate with us.
infoCollected.item2: Usage Data: We automatically collect information about your interaction with our Services. This may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, pages viewed, links clicked, and the dates and times of your visits.
infoCollected.item3: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to:
howWeUse.item1: Provide, operate, and maintain our Services.
howWeUse.item2: Improve, personalize, and expand our Services.
howWeUse.item3: Understand and analyze how you use our Services.
howWeUse.item4: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes.
howWeUse.item5: Process your transactions and manage your orders.

howWeShare.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
howWeShare.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following situations:
howWeShare.item1: With Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party vendors and service providers that perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, data analysis, and marketing.
howWeShare.item2: For Legal Reasons: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g., a court or a government agency).
howWeShare.item3: Business Transfers: In connection with any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company, your Personal Information may be transferred.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: The security of your data is important to us. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Data Protection Rights
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information: the right to access, correct, update, or request deletion of your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.

policyChanges.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: 7. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

step3.title: 3. Platform Development
step3.description: Our team builds the central IoT platform to collect, process, and visualize data, complete with a user-friendly dashboard.

step4.title: 4. Deployment & Support
step4.description: We manage the full deployment and provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your IoT ecosystem runs flawlessly.
